text: Hi every one. I have a question.

I wonder if the following is possible using serverless functions.
1. After receiving contact information and company information using the HubSpot form,
2. External API communication based on the entered company name
3. Process the response of the external API (e.g. extract only the values ​​for some keys from json data)
4. Enter the processed information into HubSpot’s CRM.

Is this possible using a serverless function?
